name: Aimless Reflections
description:
The idea for this entry was to make a shooter game "simpler" by removing aiming completely. I spent about 16 hours over 4 days developing this prototype and MrUngulate made the music.

WASD or arrow keys to move.
SPACE to shoot.
'R' to reset the level. (You'll need it)
'M' toggles sound.

...and because I didn't  build a UI and spent little time on level design: 'B' and 'N' lets you navigate back and forth between levels.
